text: Walk me through your background and what brought you to this role.
Why do you want this job, and why now?
What do you know about our company, and what stood out to you?
What are your top 2–3 strengths, and how have they helped you deliver results?
What’s a skill you’re actively improving right now, and how are you doing it?
Tell me about a time you had to learn something quickly to get the job done.
Tell me about a time you made a mistake. What did you do immediately, and what did you change afterwards?
Tell me about a time you received difficult feedback. How did you respond and what changed?
Tell me about a time you had to handle conflict with a colleague or stakeholder.
Tell me about a time you had to persuade someone who disagreed with you.
Tell me about a time you took ownership of a problem that wasn’t ‘yours’ to solve.
Tell me about a time you improved a process. What was the before/after impact?
Tell me about a time you worked under pressure with a tight deadline.
Tell me about a time you managed multiple priorities. How did you decide what mattered most?
Tell me about a time you dealt with ambiguity. What did you do first?
Tell me about a time you delivered a result you’re proud of. What was your specific contribution?
Tell me about a time you improved quality or reduced errors. How did you measure success?
Tell me about a time you had to communicate bad news. How did you handle it?
Tell me about a time you had to say ‘no’ or push back. What happened?
Tell me about a time you helped someone else succeed (coaching, support, teamwork).
Describe a time you had to make a decision with incomplete information.
Describe a time you spotted a risk early. What actions did you take?
Describe a time you improved customer experience or supported a customer in a difficult situation.
Describe a time you had to work with someone with a very different working style.
Describe a time you had to be extremely detail-oriented. What was at stake?
What motivates you at work, and what drains your energy?
What does ‘good’ look like for you in the first 30–60–90 days in a new role?
Why should we hire you over other candidates?
What salary range are you targeting, and what factors matter to you besides salary?
Do you have any questions for us? What would you want to know to decide this is the right move?
